tag_list: stephane, chapus, social-media, facebook, paris, community-management
overview:
CEO & Founder @ Le Grand Studio, Social Media Agency, Paris.

Le Grand Studio, founded early 2009, is one of the first Social Media Agency in France, involved with more than 110 international brands such as Reebok, Sony, Marvel, Sega, Nestle, L’Oreal, Toyota, or Vivendi.

Our main offices are based in Paris, and we are now setting up a new branch in Barcelona, Spain.

So far, Le Grand Studio has handled more than 200 Facebook campaigns in several european countries.
